title: Where will the event take place

content.question: According to the directions given in the e-mail, where will the event take place?

choices.label: On the second floor of the school office building
In a building to the right of the school office building
In a building behind the student activity center
In a room near the student activity center

content.answer: In a room near the student activity center

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
